Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

EAX_AUTOWAH

The structure EAX_AUTOWAH used to control the autowah filter in the EAX 4 3D provider

struct EAX_AUTOWAH
{
  S32 Slot;
  S32 Volume;
  F32 AttackTime;
  F32 ReleaseTime;
  S32 Resonance;
  S32 PeakLevel;
};

In Members

Slot
specifies the slot to query or set. Autowah can use slot 2 and/or 3.
Volume
specifies the volume of this slot in standard EAX attenuation units (-10000 to 0 fixed point millibels, default 0.0).
AttackTime
specifies attack time in seconds (0.0001 to 1.0, default 0.06).
ReleaseTime
specifies the release time in seconds (0.0001 to 1.0, default 0.06).
Resonance
specifies the resonance of the filter in standard EAX attenuation units (600 to 6000 fixed point millibels, default 6000).
PeakLevel
specifies the peak level of the filter in standard EAX attenuation units (-9,000 to 9000 fixed point millibels, default 2100).

Discussion

See the EAX 4 documentation for technical details on this filter.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Sections: Creative's EAX 4 Preferences
Related Basic Types: F32, S32
